page.title: 02Employment
page.content: There are two principal employers in the area:- 1. Harthill Farms partnership which employs 3 Dairymen, 3 Cattle Stockmen,1 Joiner, a Farm Manager and an Assistant Farm Manager and a Farm Secretary. 2. A & B Buchan, Ben Avon, Keig undertake built up felt roofing, damp proofing and metal cladding. They employ 19 men and 1 part time office worker. 3. Forestry work is carried out by a small staff (one regular plus casual labour) employed by Forbes Estate. The plantations are mainly softwood and consist of Sitka Spruce, Scots Pine, Norwegian Pine and European larch. The sawmill produces fence posts and firewood logs.
